title: Ep 87: Christian Steps on Erika's Toes
description:
In This Episode: In This Episode: Christian gets some special listener mail!  Then, we discuss a relationship that sounds like it stinks, a BF gets caught lying about his height, Danny DeVito is destroying a relationship, and a listener wants to know if she's the A-hole for not wanting GF to get a tattoo.  Also we go over our monthly movements!
Get Judgies Merch
Our Patreon is officially open, if you want to see extra content go check it out!
Send us mail! (Addressed However You'd Like) P.O. Box 58 Ottawa, IL 61350
Leave an Apple Review
Follow us on Twitter
Follow us on Instagram
Intro Music by: Iván

6:33 My BFs fetish is becoming hard to handle

16:39 Already off on a tangent
17:35 Second Story actually starts
